trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of claims extracted from an X.509 certificate that are associated with an entity.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.X509CertificateClaimSet"></xref> class by using the specified X.509 certificate.
The X.509 certificate that is added to the claim set.
Gets the number of X.509 certificate claims in this <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.X509CertificateClaimSet"></xref> object.
The number of X.509 certificate claims in this <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.X509CertificateClaimSet"></xref> object.
Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.X509CertificateClaimSet"></xref>.
Call the Dispose method when you are finished using the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.X509CertificateClaimSet>.
The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.X509CertificateClaimSet> in an unusable state.

After calling the Dispose method, you must release all references to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.X509CertificateClaimSet> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.X509CertificateClaimSet>occupied.
> [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.X509CertificateClaimSet>.
Otherwise, the resources it is using are not freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.X509CertificateClaimSet> object's `Finalize` method.
Gets the expiration time for this <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.X509CertificateClaimSet"></xref>.
The expiration time for this <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.X509CertificateClaimSet"></xref>.
Searches for the claim that matches the specified claim type and rights in the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.X509CertificateClaimSet"></xref>.
The uniform resource identifier (URI) of a claim type.
The URI of the right associated with the new claim.

A<xref uid="langword_csharp_ System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<Claim>" name=" System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<Claim>" href=""></xref> object that enables you to enumerate the claims that match the specified criteria.
Gets an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator%601> that can be used to enumerate the Windows claims in the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.X509CertificateClaimSet"></xref>.
An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator%601> that can be used to enumerate the Windows claims in the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.X509CertificateClaimSet"></xref>.
Gets the issuer for this <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.X509CertificateClaimSet"></xref>.
The issuer for a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.X509CertificateClaimSet> follows the same model as the X.509 chain for an X.509 certificate.
For instance, the root <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.X509CertificateClaimSet> is self-issued and maps to a Certificate Authority.
When a certificate in the chain is unavailable, the root <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet> is an anonymous issuer.
The issuer for this <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.X509CertificateClaimSet"></xref>.
Gets the claim for the specified index.
The index of the claim to be retrieved.
The claim for the specified index.
Gets the number of X.509 certificate claims in this <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.X509CertificateClaimSet"></xref> object.
The number of X.509 certificate claims in this <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.X509CertificateClaimSet"></xref> object.
Gets the X.509 certificate associated with this claim set.
The X.509 certificate associated with this claim set.
